nodes.label: BUILD RAPPORT
nodes.description: Smile, use their name, find common ground
nodes.script: Hi! I love your energy today. How's your week going?

nodes.label: ASK DISCOVERY QUESTIONS
nodes.script: Have you ever struggled with aches & pains challenges?

nodes.label: HANDLE: 'NOT INTERESTED'

nodes.label: PRESENT FREEDOM
nodes.script: The Freedom patch uses vibrotactile technology to help with pain relief...
